name: R E S T L E S S
name_original: R E S T L E S S
description:
Restless is a short, psychological journey to the mind of a suffering person. The story carries mature themes of depression, anxiety and overwhelming truth of a every day routine life. During story, the main character encounters a test, which he willingly accepts to participate in, but at what cost, is it truly a test or something else. 

The game was made within 48 hours for the "Untitled Game Jam #44", carrying the theme of "Nightmares". I appreciate to be part of the Jam and thanks everyone for support, especially my friend Sam Ferguson.
